ygData.subject: Re: Make research fun
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, forgot to add... Oh well, I guess I ll give my complete list of favorites, not just Research specifics. Some of these are much better/polished than
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, forgot to add... Oh well, I guess I'll give my complete list of
favorites, not just Research specifics. Some of these are much
better/polished than others but all can be useful to cross reference each
other for accuracy.
STAPLE WEBSITES
EQ Stratics - http://eq.stratics.com/
EQ Vault - http://www.eqvault.com/
EQ'Lizer - http://gameznet.com/eq/
OTHER GOOD ONES
AllaKhazam's Magical Realm - http://everquest.gamestats.com/
Graffe's Wizard - http://www.best.com/~bweetz/everquest/
Wizard Spell Research - http://www.calpoly.edu/~sdunn/wizards.htm
Mythiran Research - http://www.mythiran.com/
Japanese Maps - http://www2s.biglobe.ne.jp/~hakata/eq/index2.html
Sony - http://www.station.sony.com/everquest/
Player Vault - http://www.playervault.com/
EverLore - http://www.everlore.com/
EverWorld - http://www.everworld.net/
EQ Online - http://eq-online.com/
EQ Treasure Chest - http://www.frmug.org/eqchest/
EverGuide - http://www.missvalley.com/everguide/
Crossroads of Norrath - http://www.xrgaming.net/
EQ Glossary - http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqglossary.htm



-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Tong [mailto:biltong88@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 10:47 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Make research fun

From: Bill Tong <biltong88@...>

How about some URL's my friend :)
I know of Graffe or whatever the sitename is-but
are there others ?
